name: Learning & Development
description:
Includes:

Consultancy and Design for Personal Development Plan - the pack includes 
- A written guide
- The Personal Development Plan
- Personality, behavioral preferences and styles online questionnaire
- 2h online consultancy for implementation

Implementation check-ups and ongoing feedback - added to the previous pack
- 4 online advising sessions
- email support for a 2 months implementation timeline
- 15% discount to the Assessment/ Development Center or the Entrepreneurial Assessment Center at your choice

options.name: Online Consultancy & Design of Personal Development Plans
Implementation check-ups and ongoing feedback for the Personal Development Plans

name: Career Shifting Coaching
description: A specially designed process for facilitating the transition from employment to entrepreneurship for those who dare to wake up and live their dreams.

name: Vocational Coaching
description:
Vocational Coaching - description

Coaching (60 minutes session) – one time only
Coaching 3 month (12 sessions) – single payment option
Coaching 6 month (22 sessions) – single payment option
Coaching 12 month (40 sessions) – single payment option

name: Assessment Center
description:
Assess your motivation with our Online Motivation and Values Questionnaire and you get an extra 1-on-1 online feedback session

or

Opt for a full Assessment Center experience, have a taste of why the corporate multinational companies use it in their top management recruiting and selection process

or

If you always had a dream of running your own business, assess your ability to make that dream come true by experiencing an Assessment Center based on the 10 competencies in the Empretec UN workshop.

name: Job Application Consultancy
description:
Choose from the following:

Candidate documents support: Resume, Motivation Letter, Portfolio
... includes a Values and Motivational Questionnaire for 100 EUR

or

One-on-one sessions: Walk-through the Recruiting process
Job application support: understanding the fit with a specific role

or 

Job Interview simulations: Competency Based Interviews
... Add a written report for 100 EUR

or

Define job application strategy
Social Media support: strategies for reaching the desired job

options.name: Job application support to a specific role
Job application strategy incl. Social Media
